title: Mice in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreaming of many mice and seeing small mice in a dream

preview.html: Mice in a dream Mice cause fear and panic in the person who actually sees them and wants to escape and stay away from them. One can see many mice in a dream, so are the connotations related to seeing them good or bad? Through our article we explain the meaning of rats in a dream. Rats in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Rats in a dream. There are many interpretations related to seeing rats in a dream, and experts point to an important issue related to this vision, which is the large number of deceptive companions who will soon betray and harm the dreamer. If you chase a rat in Your home, the interpretation indicates that many unwanted things have occurred in this house, it is better to remove the harmful mouse from the house or eliminate it completely, as the stress disappears and the obstacles associated with the house are removed. Seeing mice in clothes is not a good vision, it is an indication of the appearance A certain matter that the visionary wants to hide, because its appearance causes great problems and destruction. It is better to kill the mouse in your dream so that the indicators related to the vision are happy and the person gets rid of corrupt friends or sins that he always commits and continues. While some experts indicate that a dead or killed mouse is a sign Unfavorable for a pregnant woman, because it is an increase in pregnancy problems, along with possible obstacles during her birth. Mice in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says a lot about seeing mice in a dream, and says that their presence in a place can indicate the good that one finds from that place, This is in the event that it does not harm or destroy it. While a man who sees a large group of them may be on the verge of falling into great trouble because of some women who are close to him and who are always involved with them, but who are known for corruption and immorality. Ibn Sirin expresses that seeing a mouse entering the house can It is a clear warning to the fortuneteller, as it is possible for a thief to enter his house, so he must protect it and despair to defend it. There is also a different topic, which is that the mouse leaving the house can be an annoying thing in its interpretation, as it proves a lack of blessings and a lack of livelihood, and that its presence in it is with Demolition is an expression of local problems and fears. Rats in a dream for a single woman. Commentators say that seeing a girl with rats is one of the things that confirms her confusion at that time in her life about some issues and her planning good solutions to the temporary crises that she hopes to get rid of. A girl seeing rats could be one of Symbols that indicate the many conflicts that occur between her and her friends or family as a result of the difference in the way of thinking between them, which causes many conflicts. If the girl is engaged or studying, she is worried about the subject she is studying and hopes that she will do well and not face difficulties in it. A dream about mice can warn her of some of her fiancé’s actions. She must recognize the sincerity of his intentions, not be deceived, and learn about the nature of his morals before marrying him. If a girl sees a mousetrap, this gives her good news about her close connection with the boyfriend.

title: Interpretation of seeing a person falling from a height in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a person falling from a height in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, some researchers believe that meat falling from a high place is one of the dreams that the mind sees to wake up the body after passing through it. - The long period of sleep, which may lead to danger to his life or the possibility of cardiac arrest due to sleep, but interpretation scholars had a different opinion regarding the dream of falling; Because there are many different cases. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing someone falling from above in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of dreams of seeing someone falling from above in a dream. During our article today, we will shed light on the interpretation of falling in a dream from a high position according to the sheikh of the translator Ibn Sirin, and the meaning of a boy or woman falling in a dream. Married woman or man in detail through the encyclopedia. So follow us.Interpretation of a dream about seeing falling from a high place. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees himself in a dream falling from the top of a mountain, from a high hill, or from a wall. This means that the dreamer desperately wanted something, but it did not happen. But if the dreamer continued to fall in his dream until he reached the ground and hit it, Ibn Sirin refrained from explaining it and said that an unpleasant vision does not bring any good, and God is the Most High, the Most High. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is falling From the top of his kindergarten, his mosque, or from the highest place that the dreamer loves in reality, this is evidence that the person did not obey God, but rather abandoned all sins and repented. . for him. And God repents, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if the dreamer falls very quickly in his dream without seeing where he falls, then the dream is a sign of moving to another profession. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone falling to the ground in a dream. The interpreters agreed among themselves that seeing a strange person in A dream about falling from a high hill or from a high place is an indication that the dreamer will enjoy a new and good opportunity, whether in life, work, career, love, marriage, success, or God. He is higher and knows better. But if a person sees in his dream a stranger falling from the top of a mosque, this is evidence that the dreamer is observant and observant of general rules, closeness to God, Sharia law and prohibitions in his dealings, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Better. But if one of you sees that he fell into an unclean, dirty or smelly place, then this is evidence of his poor reasoning, because he often commits sins and prohibitions, and he must repent, and God Almighty. Known.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a person fall from a high place and die in a dream. Scientists differed in the interpretation of this vision according to the dreamer and his condition. A man is different from a married woman, and so on. Below are the most important interpretations listed as follows: If the dreamer is a man and sees in his dream that he falls from a high place and then dies, then this is evidence that this man is committing a lot of disobedience and sins and he must repent and approach God Almighty, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if the fortuneteller was a woman and saw herself falling from a height and dying, then in her dream it was that she wanted to have children, but she had reached menopause and lost all hope or opportunity to have a child. Our Lord is easy, and God knows best. As for falling without death, it is an indication of

title: The 50 best interpretations of seeing sour milk in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Yogurt in a dream, buttermilk is one of the drinks that some people prefer because of its sour taste that is used to calm the digestive system. Interpretation of seeing curd in a dream What is the interpretation of curd in a dream? Buttermilk in a dream carries many things for the dreamer, but in general it is one of the visions whose aspects are beneficial to the person. If a single man sees yogurt in a dream and is looking for marriage in reality, then this vision is a sign of his approaching marriage and his association with a good person who brings him happiness. If a woman sees that she is eating yogurt, then this is a sign of her reputation that people imitate with the best and thus she is close to everyone. It is possible that this dream indicates that the dreamer will have a good opportunity to work, which he has been looking for for a long time. Seeing yogurt in a dream generally portends good things, as it is an explanation of the end of troubles and the payment of debts for those who suffer from their abundance, and it is also evidence of comfort and marriage if the dreamer is delayed. His marriage. What is the interpretation of curdled milk in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says that milk in a dream expresses many situations, but they all portend great psychological comfort and stability for the dreamer. He explains that the person who consumes curd in a dream is evidence of getting rid of sorrows and escaping from the fears that the person feels. Eating cold yogurt indicates that the dreamer has corrupt people trying to distance him from goodness and truth, so he must stay away from them. Seeing it in a dream may represent a person who falls into some simple problems that will be solved soon and do not represent any pressure on him, God willing. Enter the Egyptian dream interpretation site from Google, you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. Condensed milk in a dream for a single woman Curdled milk in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates the happy news that awaits the girl as a result of the beautiful wealth that she will obtain in life. If she sees that the man who is her relative gave her a cup of milk in a dream, this indicates the happiness that she will live with him after marriage, because he always tries to please her. If the girl seeks to achieve some things other than her big dreams, then seeing yogurt confirms that she will achieve everything she thinks about and desires In it. It shows the psychological stability that the girl enjoys, which leads to an improvement in her emotional conditions with her life partner. Eating yogurt in a dream indicates recovery if the girl is suffering from an illness, God willing. Eating or watching food is evidence of the student’s academic excellence, as well as confirmation of her great distinction among her peers. Condensed milk in a dream for a married woman Yogurt is considered a great diet in a dream for a married woman, as it is evidence of her freedom from concerns and repayment of debts that have burdened her for a long time. Eating yogurt indicates that the married woman will perform Umrah or Hajj during the year, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is eating it and it is in a bad condition and tastes bad, the subject explains the many problems in her life with the husband, which may be based on money. Yogurt can indicate the

title: Interpretation of seeing a dolphin fish in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dolphin fish in a dream Al-Basr website roy2a.com If you see a dolphin fish in a dream, this means that you will gain money, wealth, wealth, prestige, and prestige. It can indicate a cunning enemy in a man’s dream, and it means a child for a pregnant woman, as it indicates marriage to a fair and rich young man in one dream, and we will explain in detail the interpretation of seeing a dolphin fish in a dream by presenting the interpretations of imams such as Ibn Sirin and other scholars of interpretation of visions and dreams. In ancient and modern times in a dream for a young man and an unmarried girl, and for a man and a married woman and a widow and for. A pregnant woman, so follow us on the vision site. What is the interpretation of a dolphin in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing a dolphin in a dream for a man means that there is an evil person in his life who hates hostility toward him. Seeing a dolphin in a dream indicates the abundance of food and the abundance of money that he obtains in the future. His life. Seeing a dolphin swimming in clear, clean water in a dream means good news. To dream of swimming with dolphins means happiness, stability and comfort after fatigue. See also: Interpretation of eating fish in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a dolphin fish in a dream for a single woman? One If an unmarried woman sees a dolphin fish In a dream, this indicates the proposal of a young man who is calm, generous, generous, and wealthy, and she will be happy with her marriage to him. If a girl sees a white dolphin, this means that the girl will get an excellent job opportunity. See also: Interpretation of seeing raw fish in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dolphin fish? In a dream for a married woman? Seeing playing with dolphins in a dream for a married woman means that she will be pregnant and will be happy with this child. If a married woman sees a dead dolphin, this indicates many marital or family problems and psychological problems that she faces in her life. If a married man sees a dolphin outside Water in a dream, this indicates the wife’s shortcomings towards her home and towards her Lord, and her behavior must be carefully reviewed. What is the interpretation of seeing a dolphin fish in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a dolphin fish in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates ease and ease of childbirth and the cessation of pain and fatigue. If a pregnant woman sees a dolphin In her home, this indicates an easy birth and that the mother and her child are in good health. See also: Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dolphin fish in a dream for a divorced woman? A divorced woman seeing a dolphin fish in a dream indicates her marriage again, her happiness after marriage, and her physical and psychological stability. Seeing a dolphin in the water in a dream for a divorced woman means that she will join a prestigious job or receive a large sum of money. What is the interpretation of a dream when she sees a dolphin at home? Seeing dolphin fish in a dream means earning money from halal sources and a good life. Seeing a dolphin in the water A house in a dream means a lot of kindness and an abundance of money and may indicate a very cold winter. Seeing a dolphin in the house in a dream indicates the presence of an enemy for the dreamer who does not wish him well. See also: Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream What is the interpretation of a house?

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Hadid in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Hadid in a dream, its various meanings and interpretations, and we will know the interpretation based on what was stated in the books of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Nabulsi. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Hadid in a dream: Whoever reads it in a dream or something from it, or had it read to him by Abu Bakr Al-Siddiq, may God be pleased with him, and Jaafar Al-Sadiq, its strength In the religion of God Almighty, and does he have good character and His Messenger. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Hadid by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Hadid by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees that he is reading it, the effect is praiseworthy. You can watch. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Najm in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Hadid by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream of dreaming about Surat Al-Hadid by saying: Whoever reads it or has read it, like Abu Bakr Al-Siddiq, may God Almighty be pleased with him, will be hungry. Al-Sadiq said: He will be a strength in the religion of God Almighty, and he will have good character. It was said: He will gain justice and praise from the people and a healthy body, and it was said. It earns money and goods, and it is written by the believers in God and His Messenger. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Hadid in the MillenniumHe came to the rosy millennium: Security and sustenance came to the accident, and the strength of religion is the iron that embraces everything. Abu Bakr Al-Siddiq, may God be pleased with him, said, as well as Jaafar Al-Sadiq, who read Surah Al-Hadid in a dream, or something from it, or reciting it to him, is of good character. It was said that people are blessed with goodness, praise, and physical health. It was said: He takes money and goodness, and he is written who believes in God and His Messenger. And God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Hadid in a dream by Al-Ahsa’i. It indicates wealth, good luck, strength in religion, tranquility and praise among men, or in obtaining On sustenance from fatigue and hardship, or on the seriousness of courage and strength of resolve. Today, through the “Moments” website, we have presented to you the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Hadid in a dream, and in case you have any questions or dreams looking for an interpretation, share your comments with us and our experts will answer them in As soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of an ex-wife in a dream: I saw my ex-wife in a dream

preview.html: Seeing an ex-wife dead or alive, married, sad, crying, or happy with Ibn Sirin and more or not: the concept of divorce in general. A dreamer who sees himself divorcing his wife indicates dismissal from work or loss of a job. It is said that a married dreamer in his dream of divorcing his wife indicates the presence of problems that will stand in his way during Her lifeFor a sick fortune teller who sees his wife divorcing so that he does not want her back, the divorce indicates death, and if the wife is also sick, this indicates the death of his wife. Interpreters say that divorce indicates a change in the dreamer’s condition, but it is a negative change for the worse, as if the dreamer is exposed to poverty after becoming rich. The fortune teller The patient who sees that he is divorcing his wife to restore the divorce, this indicates a positive change for the better. Second: Seeing his ex-wife in a dream. The dreamer who sees his ex-wife in a dream shows worry, worry, and problems caused by divorce and separation. The dreamer who sees his ex-wife in a dream may indicate longing. To the wife and that the dreamer wants to see her again. The dreamer who sees his ex-wife sad or crying may indicate that there are problems that the ex-wife faces in her life and that there are difficulties due to this separation. The vision also shows the longing of the ex-wife. The dreamer who sees that the divorced woman returned to her home and reconciled with the man and there was a state of joy, and this indicates the need for each other and may indicate a desire for reconciliation or that it will happen soon in reality. The vision of the ex-wife may be (Divorced) because of the tension of thinking about her in reality and the fact that the dreamer is sad about her separation. In this case, the dream does not have an interpretation of dreams that are due to thinking a lot before sleep, for example, or during the day, and then we dream about them when we sleep. These dreams have no meaning and have no explanation or explanation, as the commentators have indicated. Ibn Sirin Abd al-Rahman’s vision of freedom - YouTube

A dreamer who sees himself divorcing his wife indicates dismissal from work or loss of a job. It is said that a married dreamer in his dream of divorcing his wife indicates the presence of problems that will stand in his way during Her lifeFor a sick fortune teller who sees his wife divorcing so that he does not want her back, the divorce indicates death, and if the wife is also sick, this indicates the death of his wife. Interpreters say that divorce indicates a change in the dreamer’s condition, but it is a negative change for the worse, as if the dreamer is exposed to poverty after becoming rich. The fortune teller The patient who sees that he is divorcing his wife to restore the divorce, this indicates a positive change for the better. Second: Seeing his ex-wife in a dream. To the wife and that the dreamer wants to see her again. title: Interpretation of seeing eyebrows in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eyebrows in a dream: The eyebrow is one of the elements of beauty that can have a negative or positive effect on the appearance of a girl or woman, so seeing eyebrows in a dream is one of the most famous and widespread visions, and dream and vision interpreters see that it has many interpretations that differ according to the symbols of the dream and the situation. The dreamer and according to the details of the vision, and this we will learn together through these lines. Interpretation of seeing eyebrows in a dream according to Imam Al-Nabulsi. Imam Al-Nabulsi says that there are many interpretations of seeing an eyebrow in a dream that differ according to the details of the dream, and they are as follows: It is believed that seeing black eyebrows in a dream is a sign of good health. While white eyebrows indicate longevity. Seeing beautiful eyebrows is interpreted as good news that there is a lot of goodness and blessings in one’s life. If the eyebrows have a strange color, this means that there is some bad news on the way to the dreamer during the coming period. And seeing eyebrows near From the eye is evidence that he will enjoy a high status and that his circumstances and life will develop for the better in the near future. Interpretation of seeing an eyebrow by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing an eyebrow in a dream indicates the good reputation of the dreamer or perhaps he will obtain a new position in his work. If the eyebrows are thick, This is evidence of his breadth and grace in his life. Seeing the eyebrows while they are attached to the hair shows family stability, but if the eyebrows are separated by a distance, this indicates hatred between all family members. Seeing a man’s eyebrows in a dream Some dream interpreters believe that a man who sees eyebrows in a dream has several interpretations, They are as follows: If a man sees an eyebrow in a dream, it indicates that the circumstances and affairs of his life will soon improve for the better. If a man sees his eyebrows close together, this indicates that every person in his life loves him and has affection for him. And seeing an eyebrow in a man’s dream when he is in a place other than his place indicates the hypocrisy of his owner. The vision and that it appears in a reality different from his reality. Seeing a man drawing his eyebrows is considered an unpleasant vision, but if his eyebrows are thick in the dream, it means a lot of nutrition and abundant wealth, especially if their color is white. Interpretation of seeing an eyebrow in a dream for a single woman could be for a woman to see Single Eyebrows in a dream have some different interpretations and connotations. There are some good shows and there are bad shows. Seeing an unmarried woman's eyebrows far apart from each other means unhappiness in life, or it may indicate the separation or travels of one of her relatives. She is married and plucks her eyebrows, which indicates that there is good and abundant livelihood on her way, and it can be considered a harbinger of the happiness that she will enjoy in her life in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing an eyebrow in a dream for a married woman. Interpretations of a married woman seeing an eyebrow in a dream vary according to the shape and condition of the eyebrow. There are two connected eyebrows that show the married woman’s stability in her life and her life partner’s love and attachment to her. There are various problems that indicate the existence of some problems between the spouses that cause the husband to distance himself from them

title: Interpretation of a dream about betrayal by my husband - to see betrayal in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my husband’s betrayal You can see: Interpretation of a dream about death in a dream I dreamed that my husband was cheating on me If a rich man dreams of betrayal, this indicates his poverty and adultery. Seeing friends betraying in a dream is interpreted as their appreciation and love. But if a man sees his girlfriend cheating on him, then he is waiting for a successful marriage. If A woman saw her husband cheating, so she can be sure of his honesty towards her. If you dream that you are cheating on someone close to you, this means that you do not trust him and fear that he will betray you. And if you dream of him and you are upset, then know that there is a problem between you and him. Also, betrayal in a dream indicates travel Or the journey. Interpretation of a dream about a husband’s betrayal in a dream. Cheating in general in a dream shows hatred and malice as it does in reality. It is one of the most difficult things, whether for a man or a woman. But sometimes kindness appears. Whoever sees in his dream that he is cheating on his wife with another woman, then his dream It is a sign that he has committed many sins. Perhaps his dream indicates a signal and warning to someone who seeks to reveal his secrets that may harm the dreamer in his work. Interpretation of a dream about husband cheating in a dream for a single woman: If a single woman dreams that her lover is cheating on her with another girl. Her dream is a sign that their relationship It will end, whether it is an official engagement or something else. But if a single woman sees in her dream that her fiancé is cheating on her with another woman, only conversations. And only his partner, her dream expresses a happy marriage. As for an unmarried woman who sees that her fiancé is having intercourse with another girl, her dream It indicates that her relationship went through many problems before marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a husband’s betrayal in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is cheating on her husband with someone she loves and he betrayed her, then this is her dream. It indicates a period of distress and sadness. Perhaps it indicates the illness of the dreamer, so betrayal In waking life, it is one of the dirtiest and most difficult things. In life, and among the actions of Satan, seeing a married woman in a dream is a sign of evil, not good. But if a married woman sees that her husband is cheating on her in a dream with her. A woman you know because you see her, it indicates that she and her husband are more spenders and they spend a lot of money. Their money. What she spends on forbidden things, but if a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is cheating on her with a woman she does not know. Her dream is evidence of her husband’s love for his family life, his home, and his true love for his wife. As for the one who sees in her dream that her husband is being tried on charges of cheating on him, then his dream indicates that he He will be blessed. The highest ranks in his work, and perhaps the dream indicates that her husband will travel for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about a husband’s betrayal in a pregnant woman’s dream. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is in love with someone and he betrays him. The dream indicates that she faced some diseases during her pregnancy. Perhaps her dream To give birth to a female. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her husband is cheating on her, this is evidence that she is carrying a male in her womb. Interpretation of a dream about a husband cheating on a single young man. If an unmarried young man dreams that he is cheating on his girlfriend, then his nipple indicates marriage. Successful but not He will marry his lover or another girl. But if the single man sees that he is in contact with a girl he knows, then his dream will come true

title: Interpretation of Surat Al-Kawthar in a dream Reading Surat Al-Kawthar in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of Surat Al-Kawthar for single women, married women, pregnant women, and divorced women, whether they are listening to the recitation of the Book and reading the Qur’an by Ibn Sirin and others. The meaning of Surat Al-Kawthar in a dream: Whoever sees, hears, or reads Surat Al-Kawthar, God will raise his relationship with the righteous offspring. Surat Al-Kawthar - Whoever reads it in a dream or something thereof, or has it recited to him, then He sits in the community of the people of the afterlife and the enemies are defeated. Whoever reads it will obtain money, grace, and the state, and will beget a small number of children, or win over his enemies, or perform good deeds, and he will be rewarded. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Kawthar by Ibn SirinSurat Al-Kawthar is one of the short surahs in the Book of God Almighty. The Holy Qur’an is a message from God Almighty to the Holy Prophet, our Master Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. In the case of the dreamer in the afterlife after his death, it could be news of victory over oppression and an enemy, or it could be news of food and very good things, God willing. Interpretation of Surat Al-Kawthar in an unmarried woman’s dream: To see an unmarried girl or an unmarried woman, and it is as if reading Surat Al-Kawthar in her sleep indicates An unmarried woman hopes to achieve a matter or desire that she desperately seeks, and God willing, relief will be close to her. Difficulties and challenges. As for seeing an unmarried woman as someone she knew reading Surat Al-Kawthar in her dream, this is evidence of the imminent marriage of an unmarried woman. Interpretation of Surat Al-Kawthar in a dream for a married woman. As for seeing a married woman reading Surat Al-Kawthar in her sleep, it is good news for the end of worries and problems. And revealing damage and pain, and it may foretell an imminent pregnancy. In general, Surat Al-Kawthar in a dream is considered good news for a lot of goodness and blessings in the married woman’s home and happy occasions, God willing. Interpretation of Surat Al-Kawthar in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing a pregnant woman reading Surat Al-Kawthar in her sleep foretells an appointment. Her imminent birth, and this will be easy for her, God willing, as it may be a message to sacrifice any animal that is permissible for slaughter in order to preserve the safety of the child. The fetus, and God willing, is a blessing in her life and the life of the newborn. Interpretation of Surat Al-Kawthar in a man’s dream. As for the interpretation of seeing one read or hear Surat Al-Kawthar in a man’s dream, it indicates the necessity of the dreamer to sacrifice one of the legal animals for slaughter and distribute it to the needy and the poor. In his dream, it is an indication that worries and problems will go away or recover soon, God willing. Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Kawthar in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing a dog bite in a dream in detail

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream varies depending on what the person saw in his dream, and in this article we will show you the interpretation of seeing a dog biting in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dog biting an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees each other’s dog, this is evidence of the presence of a hypocritical person entering her life and deceiving her with his love. But in reality, he does not love her and will not marry her, and the more dangerous a dog bites her in a dream, the more this person will harm her. But if the girl sees that there is a dog running after her and trying to bite her, but it managed to escape from her, this is evidence that someone He will enter her life, but he will find out first and move on. Away from him before he harms her. If a girl sees a lone white dog approaching her and trying to bite her, this is evidence that she will meet a young man with good morals. She will be very attached to him, but this young man will not have a relationship with her and will not submit her request for marriage to his relationship with her, which will not go beyond a friendship relationship. Or companionship. Interpretation of seeing a dog bite for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that there is a black dog biting her severely, this is evidence that the woman will not give birth in her life and wishes her to lose the blessing of pregnancy and the woman may be exposed. Health problems during childbirth. Interpretation of a dog bite by a divorced woman and a widow. If a divorced woman sees a dog in a dream, this is evidence that her ex-husband will hurt her a lot, he or one of his relatives. But if the dog tried to bite her, but managed to escape, she will conspire to discover that her ex-husband is running for her, and she will be able to escape from what they are planning for her. But the widow had a dog bite her, and this is evidence that there is a terrible and corrupt man who is marrying her not for her love, but For the sake of her money. Or her possessions. Seeing a dog biting a married woman. If a married woman sees a black dog in a dream, some of which are ugly, then this is evidence that there are people from her husband’s family who want to harm her and they succeed in harming and harming her. But if a married woman sees a gray dog, this is evidence of That her husband will betray her and find out about her, and there will be many problems between them that may ultimately lead to divorce. If a married woman sees a brown dog, this is evidence that there are people who are jealous of her and want to harm her and want to destroy her family, but she will succeed in getting rid of their machinations and keeping Her home and her family. For those who have visions and interpret them, we welcome your comments at the end of the article on the Shamloul website.
